title: Why is this allowed to happen?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I have been demoted more time than I wish to admit because things like this, the Jinx player got tilted mid game and decided to trash talk us, and started to feed. The player was about 12/3 on kills and deaths. Why is this allowed to happen? This player was reported but nothing seems to come of things like this and they will continue to-do things like this to other players. Please, if people start to-do things like this in person why do we have to lose LP for them purposely losing the game for us.

replies.body: Yeeeeaaaaaa buying that many boots is definitely gonna give you a bad time. It's a good thing you reported them, as that's the best way to get our attention for those types of actions. The more reports we receive, the more ammo we've got!
Sounds good, Hopefully that person will be less of a jerk next time. {{item:3070}}
